title: SKT T1 2016 Set 4%off???????
body: SKT T1 2016 Set 4%off???????SKT T1 2016 Set 4%off???????SKT T1 2016 Set 4%off???????SKT T1 2016 Set 4%off???????SKT T1 2016 Set 4%off??????? reallyyyyyyyyyyyyy?????????????????????

replies.body:
I do agree that I could have been a little cheaper for the bundle.

I mean it used to be that you could buy the team skins for like 3700 RP **WITHOUT** a discount.

and now its like $80+ to get the bundle **with** the discount...

It's fine for people who just want to buy Jhin alone, it's sweet, they get a nice 1350 skin.
But it sucks for collectors.
pls dont give anyone more of a reason to play jhin, they already made that pocket picks video on him and sneaky...
